title: How SCOTUS Distorts Democracy
description: It feels like we're still processing the end of last term, but alas, the first Monday in October is upon us. Kate, Melissa, and Leah kick off season 4 of Strict Scrutiny with a look ahead at what's sure to be another heinous Supreme Court term.
author: hey@crooked.com (leah litman, kate shaw, melissa murray)
